name: Tom is Lonely
description:
'Tom is Lonely' is a plaformer entry for the Ludum Dare 45 Game Jam with the theme 'Start with Nothing' In this game you will be able to play the same level 10 times, each time getting progressively harder, try to beat the game with the least number of deaths!

This is my first entry on a game jam, i hope you enjoy it, if you like my game consider checking out my other games on the play store and consider following me on twitter:

Twitter

Google Play

Thank you for playing!
